representation_information.name: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence V210
representation_information.description: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the fourcc code V210. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
